overview: Take a deep breath. Relax and let your chakras align. Feel the energy pulsate through you. Breathe deep. Join the boys of Buckshot as they take you on a Tantric journey of pure sexual bliss. Be one with your body and enter into a nirvana of sensual delight. Let your senses be your guide. Let your desire be your drive. Be one with Lotus.
title: Lotus
